report.name: x_stock_immo_sc

userParameter.name: P_WHERE
userParameter.initialValue: from stock_immo_sc s, ligne_bip lb, (select s1.pid, s1.ident, s1.cafi, sum(NVL(s1.consojh,0)) consojh_N, sum(NVL(s1.consoft,0)) consoft_N from stock_immo s1 group by pid,ident,cafi) a where s.ident=a.ident(+) and s.pid = a.pid(+) and s.cafi = a.cafi(+) and s.PID = lb.PID(+) and s.CODCAMO = lb.CODCAMO(+) and s.ICPI = lb.ICPI(+) and s.DPCODE = lb.DPCODE(+)
userParameter.label: P Where

dataSource.name: Q_1
dataSource.select:
select rpad(nvl(s.pid ,' '),4,' ') pid , rpad(nvl(to_char(s.cdeb,'MM/YYYY'),' '),7,' ') cdeb , rpad(nvl(s.typproj,' '),2,' ') typproj , rpad(nvl(s.metier,' '),3,' ') metier , rpad(nvl(s.pnom,' '),30,' ') pnom , lpad(nvl(to_char(s.codsg),' '),7,'0') codsg , lpad(nvl(to_char(s.dpcode),' '),5,'0') dpcode , rpad(nvl(s.icpi,' '),5,' ') icpi , lpad(nvl(to_char(s.cada),' '),6,'0') cada , lpad(nvl(to_char(s.cafi),' '),6,'0') cafi , lpad(nvl(to_char(s.codsgress),' '),7,'0') codsgress , rpad(nvl(s.libdsg,' '),30,' ') libdsg , lpad(nvl(to_char(s.codcamo),' '),6,'0') codcamo , rpad(nvl(s.clibrca,' '),16,' ') clibrca , -- FAD PPM 65049 : Non réstitution des données RESSOURCES --lpad(nvl(to_char(s.ident),' '),5,'0') ident , DECODE(:P_PARAM0,'fournisseur', DECODE( pack_habilitation.isDpgMe(s.codsgress,:P_PERIM_ME), 'O', lpad(nvl(to_char(s.ident),' '),5,'0') , DECODE( pack_habilitation.isPerimCafi( s.cafi ,:P_PERIM_CAFI) ,'N', RPAD(' ',5,' ') ,lpad(nvl(to_char(s.ident),' '),5,'0') ) ) , ' ' ) ident , -- FAD PPM 65049 : Fin
DECODE(:P_PARAM0,'fournisseur', DECODE( pack_habilitation.isDpgMe(s.codsg,:P_PERIM_ME), 'O', rpad(nvl(s.rnom,' '),30,' ') , DECODE( pack_habilitation.isPerimCafi( s.cafi ,:P_PERIM_CAFI) ,'N', RPAD(' ',30,' ') ,rpad(nvl(s.rnom,' '),30,' ') ) ) , ' ' ) rnom ,
-- FAD PPM 65049 : Non réstitution des données RESSOURCES --rpad(nvl(s.rtype,' '),1,' ') rtype , DECODE(:P_PARAM0,'fournisseur', DECODE( pack_habilitation.isDpgMe(s.codsgress,:P_PERIM_ME), 'O', rpad(nvl(s.rtype,' '),1,' ') , DECODE( pack_habilitation.isPerimCafi( s.cafi ,:P_PERIM_CAFI) ,'N', ' ' ,rpad(nvl(s.rtype,' '),1,' ') ) ) , ' ' ) rtype , -- FAD PPM 65049 : Fin rpad(nvl(s.prestation,' '),3,' ') prestation ,
DECODE(:P_PARAM0,'fournisseur', DECODE( pack_habilitation.isDpgMe(s.codsg,:P_PERIM_ME), 'O', rpad(nvl(s.niveau,' '),2,' ') , DECODE( pack_habilitation.isPerimCafi( s.cafi ,:P_PERIM_CAFI) ,'N', RPAD(' ',2,' ') ,rpad(nvl(s.niveau,' '),2,' ') ) ) , ' ' ) niveau ,
-- FAD PPM 65049 : Non réstitution des données RESSOURCES --rpad(nvl(s.soccode,' '),4,' ') soccode , DECODE(:P_PARAM0,'fournisseur', DECODE( pack_habilitation.isDpgMe(s.codsgress,:P_PERIM_ME), 'O', rpad(nvl(s.soccode,' '),4,' ') , DECODE( pack_habilitation.isPerimCafi( s.cafi ,:P_PERIM_CAFI) ,'N', RPAD(' ',4,' ') ,rpad(nvl(s.soccode,' '),4,' ') ) ) , ' ' ) soccode , -- FAD PPM 65049 : Fin lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.coutftht, 'FM9999999999D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') coutftht , lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.coutft, 'FM9999999999D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') coutft , lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(NVL(a.consojh_N,0) , 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') consojh_N, lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(NVL(a.consoft_N,0) , 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') consoft_N, lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(NVL(s.consojh ,0.00), 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') consojh , lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.consoft, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') consoft, lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.a_consojh, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') a_consojh, lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.a_consoft, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') a_consoft, CHR(13) &P_WHERE order by s.pid, s.cdeb, s.ident, s.cafi

dataDescriptor.expression: DECODE ( : P_PARAM0 , 'fournisseur' , DECODE ( pack_habilitation.isDpgMe ( s.codsg , : P_PERIM_ME ) , 'O' , rpad ( nvl ( s.rnom , ' ' ) , 30 , ' ' ) , DECODE ( pack_habilitation.isPerimCafi ( s.cafi , : P_PERIM_CAFI ) , 'N' , RPAD ( ' ' , 30 , ' ' ) , rpad ( nvl ( s.rnom , ' ' ) , 30 , ' ' ) ) ) , ' ' )

DECODE ( : P_PARAM0 , 'fournisseur' , DECODE ( pack_habilitation.isDpgMe ( s.codsg , : P_PERIM_ME ) , 'O' , rpad ( nvl ( s.niveau , ' ' ) , 2 , ' ' ) , DECODE ( pack_habilitation.isPerimCafi ( s.cafi , : P_PERIM_CAFI ) , 'N' , RPAD ( ' ' , 2 , ' ' ) , rpad ( nvl ( s.niveau , ' ' ) , 2 , ' ' ) ) ) , ' ' )

dataSource.name: Q_2
dataSource.select: select 'Le nombre de CA est trop grand Merci de contacter la MO BIP' erreur from dual

dataDescriptor.expression: 'Le nombre de CA est trop grand Merci de contacter la MO BIP'

function.name: afterpform
g_pidgroupfilter
g_erreurgroupfilter
